short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically apply coupons, track your orders, and unlock exclusive deals!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Be rewarded for who you are.

Checkmate's a browser extension that generates you personalized deals based on who you are at 100k online stores.

Your data's everywhere. Put it to work. Tell Checkmate about yourself in 30 seconds and start saving everywhere.

1 million users across iOS and Chrome.
$100,000,000 saved.
100,000 sites supported!
